content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good evening, Max. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What are your thoughts on the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. What is your proposal?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: My proposed rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is 500 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and other expenses. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a lower price. What is your counteroffer?
```
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: My counteroffer for the rental price of this 25 square meter apartment is 450 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and other expenses. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for the size and location of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine
